title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.13 - Vouchers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.13 - Vouchers

State Regulations
(a) Each voucher
issued, except special promotional vouchers as approved by the commission, must
have printed on its face: (1)
the name of the
authorized pari-mutuel wagering entity where the voucher was issued; (2)
the unique computer-generated voucher
number; (3)
the date and time the
voucher was issued; (4)
the number
of the ticket-issuing machine; and
(5)
the dollar amount of the
voucher. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4300.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
